# Introduction

Welcome to our OEDA-branded presentation using Reveal.js!

## Key Features

- **Consistent Branding**: Uses OEDA color palette and typography
- **Professional Layout**: Optimized for presentations
- **Interactive Elements**: Code copying, navigation controls
- **Flexible Themes**: Support for light/dark mode switching

## Code Example

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| eval: false

library(ggplot2)
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point(color = "#2E3192") +  # OEDA primary color
  labs(title = "Sample Plot with OEDA Branding")
```
